name: Chad
description: Finding his love life wasn't working, Chad made a fist life.
strategies: As Chad, your only weapons are your fists.
Charge into battle unexpected. Your health pool might be high, but people can walk a lot faster than you run.
You can dash around. This dash, however, does not leave you invincible.

name: Pity
description: Wandering the plains, Pity healed townfolk with an arrow through the head. He owned an insurance firm.
strategies: As Pity, you can heal anyone.
Make fights unfair by healing the attacker. Pick off those who walk away.
Your bombs are unavoidable as much as they are expected. Roll them around corners.

name: Wimp
description: In life, Wimp started out running. Then he kept running. As a baby, he ran out of the womb.
strategies: As Pansy, you run fast. Evade enemies and choose your fights.
As the weakest character in the game, you must use your environment to your advantage.
Your gun is not strong at long range. Get close to enemies to kill most characters in 2 hits.
